title: Yu Shang Food Inc. Recalls Ready-to-Eat Meat and Poultry Products Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: Editor’s Note: November 21, 2024 – FSIS and our public health partners, including the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and state public health officials, are investigating a multistate outbreak of Listeria monocytogenes infections linked to ready-to-eat (RTE) meat and poultry products produced by...
